data.oai_dc:dc: Abundance of benthic megafauna at OFOS station PS78/171-1 (N3)

Actiniaria, Amphipoda, ARK-XXVI/2, Bathycrinus cf. carpenteri, Bythocaris spp., Candelabrum sp., Caulophacus, debris, Caulophacus arcticus, Cladorhiza gelida, Comatulia, Crustacea, Elpidia heckeri, Flatworm, Gersemia fruticosa, Hausgarten, Hormathiidae, Hymenaster pellucidus, Identification, Kolga hyalina, Long-term Ecological Research at AWI, Long-term Investigation at AWI-Hausgarten off Svalbard, LTER, Lycodes frigidus, Mesidothea megalua, Mohnia sp., N3, Ocean Floor Observation System, OFOS, Ophiocten hastatum, Polarstern, Pourtalesia jeffreysi, PS78, PS78/171-1, Pycnogonida, Sponge, Suprabenthos, Verum striolatum
